document.full_text: glencore chief executive ivan glasenberg could be worth $10 billion after the commodities trader makes its debut later this month in a record public offering valuing the commodities group at some $60 billion.
document.title: glencore $11 billion ipo to make billionaires of bosses
lines_and_colors: glencore chief executive ivan glasenberg could be worth $10 billion after the commodities trader makes its debut later this month in a record public offering valuing the commodities group at some $60 billion.
